commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basdf44090"

diff:
"df44090 Rename Content-Access-Control to Access-Control. bug=397877 r+sr+a1.9=jonas
diff --git a/content/base/src/nsCrossSiteListenerProxy.cpp b/content/base/src/nsCrossSiteListenerProxy.cpp
index 5ab0cbf..5c603fc 100644
--- a/content/base/src/nsCrossSiteListenerProxy.cpp
+++ b/content/base/src/nsCrossSiteListenerProxy.cpp
@@ -164,10 +164,10 @@ nsCrossSiteListenerProxy::OnStartRequest(nsIRequest* aRequest,
   }
   mReqSubdomains.AppendElement(Substring(host, currDot));
 
-  // Check the Content-Access-Control header
+  // Check the Access-Control header
   if (http) {
     nsCAutoString ac;
-    rv = http->GetResponseHeader(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("Content-Access-Control"), ac);
+    rv = http->GetResponseHeader(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("Access-Control"), ac);
     
     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv)) {
       CheckHeader(ac);
diff --git a/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_fail2.xml^headers^ b/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_fail2.xml^headers^
index 6ab29c9..646a369 100644
--- a/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_fail2.xml^headers^
+++ b/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_fail2.xml^headers^
@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
 HTTP 200 OK
-Content-Access-Control: allow <*>, deny <*>
+Access-Control: allow <*>, deny <*>
diff --git a/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_pass1.xml^headers^ b/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_pass1.xml^headers^
index 0e66148..4c535d9 100644
--- a/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_pass1.xml^headers^
+++ b/content/base/test/file_CrossSiteXHR_pass1.xml^headers^
@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
 HTTP 200 OK
-Content-Access-Control: allow <localhost:8888> exclude <localhost.bar> <bar.localhost>, deny <*> exclude <localhost:8888>
+Access-Control: allow <localhost:8888> exclude <localhost.bar> <bar.localhost>, deny <*> exclude <localhost:8888>
"
